title: Lady General: My Word Is Your Command, Tyrant - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient Times   Beautiful Female Lead   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Imperial Harem   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Power Couple   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnation   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Second Chance   Smart Couple   Strong Love Interests   Time Travel
author: 不思量
description:
In a previous life, he was an emperor, with no concubines in his harem, who died when his country perished; she was a lady general, who led tens of thousands of soldiers but died on the battlefield, being framed for treason. They were a pair but they couldn’t protect each other. 

After rebirth, he swore he’d love her and make her happy for the whole life!>
